1.text: Clear phlegm or mucus from your throat by coughing.

2.text: Gargle with warm water and salt.
2.vid: /e/ec/Clear the Throat of Mucus Step 2 Version 6.360p.mp4

3.text: Drink plenty of liquids during the day.
3.vid: /6/6e/Clear the Throat of Mucus Step 3 Version 6.360p.mp4

4.vid: /2/2b/Clear the Throat of Mucus Step 4 Version 6.360p.mp4

5.vid: /8/8f/Clear the Throat of Mucus Step 5 Version 6.360p.mp4

6.text: Remove mucus on your tongue with a tongue scraper.

7.vid: /e/ed/Clear the Throat of Mucus Step 6 Version 6.360p.mp4

8.text: Add turmeric powder to liquids to keep the digestive tract working.
8.vid: /3/35/Clear the Throat of Mucus Step 7 Version 6.360p.mp4

9.text: Eat spicy foods to get the mucus loose and runny.
9.vid: /f/ff/Clear the Throat of Mucus Step 8 Version 6.360p.mp4

10.text: Stay away from milk and dairy.
10.vid: /0/09/Clear the Throat of Mucus Step 9 Version 6.360p.mp4

11.vid: /5/55/Clear the Throat of Mucus Step 10 Version 6.360p.mp4

12.vid: /d/dd/Clear the Throat of Mucus Step 11 Version 6.360p.mp4

13.text: Avoid other irritants such as strong chemicals or paints.
13.vid: /a/a3/Clear the Throat of Mucus Step 12 Version 6.360p.mp4

14.text: Know if you have a cold.
14.vid: /8/84/Clear the Throat of Mucus Step 13 Version 5.360p.mp4

15.text: Know if you may have post-nasal drip.
15.vid: /a/a5/Clear the Throat of Mucus Step 14 Version 5.360p.mp4

16.text: Know if the mucus is being caused by seasonal allergies or an allergic reaction.
16.vid: /2/2c/Clear the Throat of Mucus Step 15 Version 5.360p.mp4

17.text: Know that being pregnant can exacerbate mucus production.
17.vid: /9/97/Clear the Throat of Mucus Step 16 Version 5.360p.mp4

18.text: Consider if mucus on your tongue could be thrush.
